segments.text: I don't know what I'm going to do . I need to find a job . If I don't , I won't be able to stay here next semester .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you tried university part-time jobs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mean in the library , or in some information center.Often the university hires foreign students for part-time positions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know . I tried that.They don't have anything now . So what can I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , since you're a foreign student , it's hard.That ' s because it's actually illegal for you to work in America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that . You don't have to tell me that . That's my problem . I know I have the right to work for the university . That's legal.But they don't have a job for me . And it's illegal for me to get a job elsewhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , there must be some solution.You know there are many people working illegally in New York .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I need a pretty decent job . I need to make enough to pay my rent at least .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since you're Chinese , maybe you can find part-time work in Chinatown .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , why don't you go and look down there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don't know what I would do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It may be part-time work as a waitress or something.It would be illegal , but sometimes waitresses make a good salary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will ask my friends for you.Maybe someone knows a company that needs part-time people.That ' s another thing you should do . Ask all your friends to ask around for you.You might find something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to find something.Otherwise I have to go back to Taiwan . I'll be broke in two months .
segments.speaker: S1
